name: Scrap Shooter (Fielder)
description:
A shooter game i randomly made in free time

Features:

  • Moving with WASD/Arrows
  • Shooting with left click mouse and rotate your player with your mouse
  • With some enemies are Invaders and Grenadiers
  • Shoot Obstacles/Enemies to get more points
  • Enemies randomly spawn lives when died

The development of the game is canceled due to my boredness :p
